page.title: 11LEISURE AND RECREATION
page.content: We asked 82 people about the sport and leisure pursuits that they take part in Dodworth. We found that there were a variety of sporting activities ;from keep fit to golf ,dancing to Karate. There is also a wide selection of Leisure facilitees including -Scout and Guide Movement,Young Wives,Working Mens Club and Comunity Centre for the elderly.Of the people we asked only 18 % didnt take part in anything in Dodworth and the majority of these didnt realsise what there was to do.Most people would like to see a Sports Centre in Dodworth,but of course this is not pratically or financially possible.The five most popular pursuits in Dodworth are public house,The Scout and Guide movements,Football,Bowling and Clubs.
